solution_line_template: Jorge spent {num_tickets} tickets * ${price_per_ticket} per ticket = $<<{num_tickets}*{price_per_ticket}={total_cost_before_discount}>>{total_cost_before_discount} total.
After applying the discount, Jorge spent ${total_cost_before_discount} * {discount_factor} = $<<{total_cost_before_discount}*{discount_factor}={final_cost}>>{final_cost}.
